title: XL Joushi.
overview: Saki Watase is a female office worker who is running out of money. She takes a part-time job as a product tester and has to review an XL-size condom. Keisuke Sud≈ç, Saki's "demon boss" she dislikes, reveals that he is XL-size. A romance then develops between Saki and Keisuke.
